texts.content_text7: Begins to think more logically about concrete events
texts.content_text8: Increasing ability to regulate emotions, but still needs support
texts.content_text4: May struggle to understand abstract ideas like intention or long-term consequences
texts.content_text6: Communication is often literal and closely tied to immediate experiences
texts.content_text3: Can consider hypothetical situations and different perspectives
texts.content_text5: Developing a stronger sense of identity and autonomy
